website_summaries.verdict: Just 20 seconds to apply and hair looks and feels thicker and fuller. Restores confidence.
pros: Works best on hair at least an inch and a half long
Not messy, with no residual fibers floating on clothing and/or while sleeping
Stays on well, without running in rain or sweat
cons: Not good for those with extensive hair loss or major baldness
Can be clumpy if brushed excessively
Colors don't blend well with own natural color

customer_reviews.title: Red tones..
customer_reviews.text: This product would have worked well, but the light brown had red undertones and so it didn't match. So, keep that in mind when ordering. I haven't used a spray hair camouflage, but this product was really good as far as messiness. You shake it on (like a large salt shaker) so there is no risk of mist getting on unintended targets. In all, I'm glad they have a return policy as it is headed back. Sad. I really wanted it to work. On to the next product...
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S

customer_reviews.title: People noticed it.
customer_reviews.text: I put some on and later in front of someone I combed my hair a bit and my shoulder was covered with this stuff. Soooo embarrassing. She knew what it was. Viviscal sticks to your hair and scalp sooo much better. I will never buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: CHASE987

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be more pleased. It was very easy to use and made ...
customer_reviews.text: After two surgeries my hair really thinned. Every time I looked in the mirror I could see more scalp and I always have to check the back in a mirror to make sure the "bare spots" are covered. A friend told me about hair powder. After reading the reviews for this product I gave it a try. I couldn't be more pleased. It was very easy to use and made the thinning much less noticeable to me. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: susan hansel

customer_reviews.title: Confidence in a Shaker!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a confidence saver when I went through chemotherapy and lost a great deal of hair. I was suppose to lose all of my hair by my 2nd treatment but shockingly only thinned at the crown of my head. I paired this product with colored spray (made for root touch ups between colors) to help camouflage the white of my scalp. It is amazing how the CUUVA hair fibers clinged onto the little bit of hair I had left and created an illusion of having a full head of hair. I just wish I would have saved the $700 I spent on a wig and found this first!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK for value, reconsider for quality
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for quality, stick with Toppik. This is a great product for value. However, you can tell that the fibers aren't high quality. I often find clumped fibers on my forehead and scalp. Also, it eeeeeeasily smears on anything your head makes contact with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I PLAN TO BUY MORE!
customer_reviews.text: It works better than I expected. The color is perfect and all thin spots are invisible once I shake it on. Now I don't have to wear a wig. YEAH! The ONLY negative is that the container can't be opened. I hope that Cuvva changes that.
customer_reviews.author: R.Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for one day or a few hours. It will wipe off, so be careful. It was not what I expected, I tried it with my beard and on top of my head.
customer_reviews.author: JandS

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well on my part!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom, and I’ve used it as well. We both have thick, dark brown hair and I hate seeing a skin colored line on my scalp where my part is. It’s not messy and is thinner than a powder. The fibers fall straight to the scalp, no rubbing or touching. Will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: K8

customer_reviews.title: Bottle design update.
customer_reviews.text: Cuvaa is absolutely amazing!! Definitely has met my expectations above & beyond. However, the only issue I have would be about the bottle design. It is difficult to tell how much product is left in the bottle because of its solid black color. Perhaps a new bottle design should be considered where there is a clear slot going along the length of the bottle from top to bottom. Besides the bottle design flaw, love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver’s Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely did not like this product. It was too fine and did not adhere very well to my hair and when it did, it did not look natural. When I lightly used hair spray, all it did was clump up. I'll go back to Toppik.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: I’m satisfied! Definitely a problem-solver and confidence booster!
customer_reviews.text: Loving it so far. My first time to use it this morning and I haven’t used a lot of the powder, but I was still impressed. Definitely increased my confidence. I wish I have known this product earlier!
customer_reviews.author: NEIL R.

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I have used at least 5 different concealers on areas of my hair that are thinning, all with some results. This one works as good as any of them, including the ones that are higher priced. It is easy to apply. I did not give it 5 stars because it does rub off if you are not careful, but then again I did not use anything to keep it in place like hair spray.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Maggio

customer_reviews.title: Hair building fibers
customer_reviews.text: The ease of use is great and it does what it says it can do for you. Overall I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Please don't hesitate purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product,where have you been hiding. You need to advertise your product more,especially on television,etc. I came across this product by mistake and am very glad I did. More people need to know your product exists A lot of people are suffering from some form of hair loss and is not aware there are options of this exist.' a little expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M

customer_reviews.title: I like the texture of the fibers
customer_reviews.text: I like the texture of the fibers. I accidentally slept with it on one night and was disappointed that it did not stay on. Otherwise, it does serve it's purpose during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Bergh

customer_reviews.title: Confidence
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for the small thinning hair on top of my head lasts pretty much all day then wash off at night most importantly you get your confidence back will definitely be purchasing another soon.
customer_reviews.author: KRIT

customer_reviews.title: Looks Natural and stays on.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to use. Can get messy so make sure you put it on over a sink. Also don’t ware if it’s raining.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Joel

customer_reviews.title: This is by far one of the best concealers I've used and I've used them for at ...
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best concealers I've used and I've used them for at least ten years. I had to buy a small container of Toppik while waiting for this to come and had forgotten how much I hated it. Toppik is terrible, does not cling...just falls off of the scalp. The colors are not too great either. Cuvva simply does it best, stays put and the colors are decent.
customer_reviews.author: lindaroze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much better that Topik! This product is a reasonably priced and works like a charm.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome product, I recommend to everyone, and using for about 1 month and half and still have half , very nice

customer_reviews.text: This product works fine. The medium brown is darker than I thought it would be!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to write a review but i thought this would help other women as i always read the reviews on all the hair products i tried to regain my confidence.I love this product. I have tried everything and this is a life savor. I have gained 100 % of my confidence back from this product and am truly blessed to have found it.

customer_reviews.title: It works,
customer_reviews.text: It works, gets a little clumpy if you use a little water (generally to wipe off of face but gets hairline

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this product! covers very easily. wish there was some way to stop it from transferring to anything your head touches! but it does the job

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product, really does the trick
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product, really does the trick. I feel confident with it and my friends ask me what did I do to have more hair !
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: This one is THE winner!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product....shakes out easily...looks great. Some other hair fibers that I've tried clump so badly, the fibers don't shake out of the dispenser bottle.

customer_reviews.title: Good product with Amazing customer service from Amazing Exclusives !!
customer_reviews.text: Good product with Amazing customer service from Amazing Exclusives !!

customer_reviews.title: Helps style
customer_reviews.text: I use it every time I do my hair when it's dry. I have curly kind of short hair and it helps me style my hair. I'm not even really sure it gives volume, but it helps styling.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical at first because I had a similar product by another company that I was pleased with except for their customer se
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered on time and does exactly what it says. I was skeptical at first because I had a similar product by another company that I was pleased with except for their customer service was horrible. So I tried this Cuvva reluctantly but was very pleased and will continue to use it.

customer_reviews.title: Better than others I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Better than any similar product I've tried (that includes Joan Rivers' product, Topix, one or two other powder products and one spray-on). Cuvva seems to cover better and stay on better. It's all I'm using now and I'm very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: so nice
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time today and i love it. It's works with a little spray

customer_reviews.title: This product is truly amazing. I have dark thin hair
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly amazing. I have dark thin hair. You can see my white scalp thru my thin hair . . . But not when I am using CUVVA. Love it love it!!! Other reviews said it shows up on your clothes. This has not happened to me. In fact I it doesn't even get on my pillow. I use it all over my head. I will never be without it. By the way my hairdresser told me about it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra H. Ard

customer_reviews.title: the canister is like a large salt shaker so it makes a mess
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok. I have dark brown hair, but the dark brown shade is almost black. If I order more I will order medium brown. Also, the canister is like a large salt shaker so it makes a mess; there is no way to get it into a small area without it going everywhere. It serves its purpose, but it has its issues.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: I really like it but wish there was a clear strip on ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it but wish there was a clear strip on bottle so you can tell how much is left in container.

customer_reviews.title: It works perfect to cover bald areas.

customer_reviews.title: Really works! I have significant thinning on the crown ...
customer_reviews.text: Really works! I have significant thinning on the crown of my head and this product covers it well. I tried a spray before Cuvva and it didn't last as long and it came off on my fingers when I scratched my head. This stuff does not rub off.

customer_reviews.title: Best hair fiber on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best hair fiber on the market... The wide round dispenser makes it very easy for the fibers to fill in the bold spots with no effort. Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. To my mind it's even better than a competing one. The texture is more gentle and hair adhesion is stronger.

customer_reviews.title: Try it..,you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: This product (Cuvva) is amazing! The look of thinning hair is no longer a problem. It stays in your hair until it's washed out...nothing on your pillow or on your clothes.

customer_reviews.title: This works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This works like a charm!! Very effective, reliable, clean, and natural (sort of). If youre going bald in one area, this will make that spot seem like it is full of hair. Amazing product!! bought again and again!

customer_reviews.title: For medium drown and it looked like it had a green tint to it
customer_reviews.text: Far inferior to other products out there. For medium drown and it looked like it had a green tint to it. Horrible. Garbage... Get cabooki or godybr but don’t buy this.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but use sparingly!
customer_reviews.text: It works great. You don't need to use too much. I just tilt my head and sprinkle a little on the side where my hair is thinning and use a little hair spray. This is more economical than the John Freida colored spray I was using.

customer_reviews.title: When I applied this product, large amount of the ...
customer_reviews.text: When I applied this product, large amount of the powder came out of the bottle, and made a big mess.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product
customer_reviews.text: It really does hide the receding hairline and makes me feel more confident. Works like a charm. My only concern is in the gym class when you have to lie down for situp because some of the fibers do drop out.

customer_reviews.title: and all was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed on how natural it looks and blends in with my natural hair.My very thin ,bald spot on the crown of my head has disappeared. I went out at 7:00 last evening and I checked my "cover up" when I got in at midnight, and all was perfect.

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far. Doing what it is supposed to do. Fills up empty spaces. I put a piece of clear tape on top to control the flow of fibers.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and stayed on

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job for thin hair
customer_reviews.text: Very good product but I think it dries out my hair. I do find it covers well and blends into my own hair well.

customer_reviews.text: Cuvva is a great product. Blends in with you hair easily and makes my thinning top and hairline appear full.

It does make my hair look dry but found a fix for that; since need to use hair spray anyway, use..'Dove hair therapy, style+care, strength & shine extra hold hairspray. Gets some shine in. And can finger comb hair and leaves no gummy feeling.

customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too sure how well this stuff would work (I have long hair that I keep pulled back in a ponytail) but the results are amazing! My girlfriend says it looks natural and I agree. It doesn't take very much to fill in the thinning spot towards the back of my head and it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had more staying power
customer_reviews.text: My hair is thinning at the crown and edges. I have used Toppik and was looking for a more natural coverage. This product is much more natural looking than Toppik. However, it has not the staying power of Toppik. My hair is curly, so I wet it each morning to revive the curls. This product comes right out. I've tried sealing it with hairspray, which I hate to use on my hair. But it still washes out with water. It is also just as messy as Toppik. I would prefer this over Toppik if it didn't come off when wet. Would be afraid to get caught in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: mshumph

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: First time using anything like this. It works really great on my thinning hair. Could be better if the bottle were not as large in diameter. I actually dump it in the lid and use a large brush to apply. This helps control getting a large clump in one spot. I also apply some sticky hairspray after I put it on and that helps hold it in when I comb or brush the places I put it in.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

product_meta.title: CUVVA Hair Fibers for Thinning Hair (MEDIUM BROWN) - Keratin Hair Building Fiber Hair Loss Concealer - Thicker Hair in 15 Seconds - 25g/0.87oz Bottle - For Men & Women
feature_bullets: GET THICKER LOOKING HAIR IN SECONDS: Cuvva Hair Fiber covers and fills out thinning hair in seconds!
BEST FOR MEN & WOMEN: Regain lost confidence with Medium Brown Cuvva Hair Powder; 2-3 months supply.
INSTANT HAIR THICKENER: Sprinkle fibers onto the thin areas, takes 20 seconds; wash out when done!
CUVVA KERATIN HAIR FIBERS: Made of the best organic protein, interlaces with natural hair perfectly.
100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee on all hair loss products when you Buy Today!
